themes.description: Covers problems related to account balance discrepancies, unauthorized activity, or general account management concerns.
Addresses requests for new trading functionalities, improvements to existing trading tools, or complaints about missing features.
Covers requests for new features, improvements, or issues specific to the mutual fund investment section of the platform.
Positive feedback or general appreciation for the platform's overall quality, ease of use, or investment opportunities without specific feature mentions.
Suggestions for new features, improvements to existing functionalities, or requests for specific additions to the platform's offerings.
Requests or feedback related to long-term investment tools, portfolio tracking, or specific investment product offerings like mutual funds.
General feedback on the app's usefulness, ease of use, or suitability for specific user groups like beginners.
Suggestions for new features, tools, or functionalities to be added to the platform.
Issues related to data privacy, account security, unauthorized access, or vulnerability concerns.
Feedback on the app's user interface, navigation, information display, and overall user experience.
Suggestions for new features, enhancements, or missing functionalities within the application.
This theme covers issues related to activating specific trading segments or features within the user's account.
This theme covers complaints about the absence of desired features or functionalities within the platform.
This theme covers problems with adding, updating, or linking bank accounts to the platform, especially due to mergers or changes.
Complaints or feedback regarding the results of investment applications or processes, such as IPO allotments, fund performance, or application success rates.
Issues related to account opening, activation, closure, or profile updates.
This theme covers general positive or negative feedback regarding the ease of use, user interface, and overall user experience of the application.
Addresses complaints about the user interface, design, ease of navigation, and overall user experience of the application.
Pertains to concerns about the security of invested funds, difficulty in retrieving money, or general trust issues regarding the safety of investments.
This theme covers reviews alleging fraudulent behavior, scams, or deceptive practices by the application or service.
